question: What is your return policy?
answer: Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase with original receipt. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

question: Can I exchange an item instead of returning?
answer: Yes, exchanges are allowed for items in original condition. Choose the exchange option when initiating a return.

question: Do I get a full refund for returned items?
answer: Yes, full refunds are issued for returned items in original condition. Shipping fees are non-refundable unless defective.

question: Can I return sale or clearance items?
answer: Sale and clearance items are final sale and cannot be returned unless defective.

question: What shipping options are available?
answer: We offer Standard (5-7 days, $5.99), Express (2-3 days, $12.99), and Overnight ($24.99) shipping. Free shipping for orders over $50.

question: Can I track my order?
answer: Yes, all orders provide a tracking number via email once shipped. Use it to track your delivery online.

question: What if my order is late?
answer: If your order is delayed beyond the estimated delivery date, contact customer support for assistance and possible compensation.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes, we ship to selected countries. International shipping costs and delivery times vary. Customs fees may apply.

question: Do electronics have a warranty?
answer: All electronics come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering defects. Accidental damage is not included.

question: How do I claim a warranty?
answer: To claim a warranty, contact our support with your order ID and a description of the defect. We will guide you through the replacement process.

question: Are accessories covered under warranty?
answer: Accessories are covered only if specified in the product description. Standard wear and tear are not covered.

question: How is my personal data handled?
answer: Customer information is stored securely and never shared with third parties. Review our Privacy Policy for complete details.

question: Can I request deletion of my data?
answer: Yes, you may request deletion of your personal data by contacting support. We will comply within 30 days where legally permitted.

question: How do you protect payment information?
answer: All transactions are encrypted with SSL/TLS. Payment data is securely processed and not stored on our servers.

question: What should I do if I notice unauthorized activity?
answer: Immediately contact customer support and your payment provider to secure your account and report unauthorized transactions.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay.

question: Is it safe to use my credit card on your site?
answer: Yes, all transactions are secured with industry-standard SSL encryption. We never store your full credit card details.
